media.title: MTTokenMetadataMedia
media.description: URL to associated media, preferably to decentralized, content-addressed storage

media_hash.title: MTTokenMetadataMediaHash
media_hash.description: Base64-encoded sha256 hash of content referenced by the `media` field. Required if `media` is included.

issued_at.title: MTTokenMetadataIssuedAt
issued_at.description: When token was issued or minted, Unix epoc in milliseconds

expires_at.title: MTTokenMetadataExpiresAt
expires_at.description: When token expires, Unix epoch in milliseconds

starts_at.title: MTTokenMetadataStartsAt
starts_at.description: When token starts being valid, Unix epoch in milliseconds

updated_at.title: MTTokenMetadataUpdatedAt
updated_at.description: When token was last updated, Unix epoch in milliseconds

extra.title: MTTokenMetadataExtra
extra.description: Anything extra the MT wants to store on-chain. Can be stringified JSON.

reference.title: MTTokenMetadataReference
reference.description: URL to an off-chain JSON file with more info.

reference_hash.title: MTTokenMetadataReferenceHash
reference_hash.description: Base64-encoded sha256 hash of JSON from reference field. Required if `reference` is included.
